name: Wound Poison
tooltip:
Wound Poison
Item Level 32
Classes: Rogue
Requires Level 32
Use: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 30 minutes.
Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing all healing effects used on them by 55 for 15 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times on a single target.  60 charges.
Max Stack: 20
Sell Price: 42
